Format.ReportDescription:
The Operational Performance Summary shows what percentage of scheduled trips the system has tracked on each day in the reporting period.

Operator
Only running boards operated by the select operators will be reported.

Route
Only running boards containing the selected route will be reported.

Date
Only date for the selected period will be reported. Note that data for today does not exist until created by the summary data production program tonight.

Select the type of Output and Level of Detail required and Execute

Query.TableSql: t_tripsum, outer route pbroute, outer ( vehicle veh1, vehicle veh2, outer (unit_build, gprs_mapping) )
Query.WhereSql: AND t_tripsum.maxveh = veh1.vehicle_id AND t_tripsum.minveh = veh2.vehicle_id AND t_tripsum.firstroute = pbroute.route_id AND veh1.build_id = unit_build.build_id AND unit_build.build_id = gprs_mapping.build_id
AND operator.operator_id = route_visibility.operator_id AND usernm = USER

Graph.Title: Performance Summary {operator_code}
Graph.YTitle: Percentage of journeys tracked by the RTPI System
